scripts.export: next build && next export -o build && npx next-image-export-optimizer
scripts.deploy:withoutFunctions: npm run export && firebase deploy --only hosting,storage,firestore
scripts.deploy:withFunctions: npm run export && cd ./functions && npm run setEnv && cd .. && firebase deploy
scripts.firebase:hosting: npm run export && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.firebase:hosting:preview: npm run export && firebase hosting:channel:deploy preview
scripts.test:firestore:rules: firebase emulators:exec --only firestore "cd test && cd firestore && npm run test"
scripts.test:e2e: npx playwright install && playwright test --project chromium
scripts.test:e2e:codegen: npx playwright install && playwright codegen localhost:3000
